thread.title: Rupee gains against dollar, touches 18.36 vs dirham - Khaleej Times
thread.title_full: Rupee gains against dollar, touches 18.36 vs dirham - Khaleej Times

author: Pti Mumbai
title: Rupee gains against dollar, touches 18.36 vs dirham - Khaleej Times
text: Rupee gains against dollar, touches 18.36 vs dirham PTI /Mumbai Filed on February 2, 2017 Share Vote The dollar turned weak globally, which supported the rupee up move Looking good for the seventh session, the rupee advanced another 5 paise to 67.42 against the dollar (18.36 Dirham) in early trade today as there was no let-up in selling of the American currency by exporters and banks. The dollar turned weak globally, which supported the rupee up move. But this was offset by fresh losses in domestic equities, dealers said. Yesterday, the local currency ended at 1-1/2 month high of 67.47 by rising 40 paise, its biggest single-day gain this year, on the back of frantic dollar offloading amid expectations of a Fed rate hike delay. In the meantime, the benchmark Sensex traded lower by 50.61 points, or 0.18 per cent, at 28,091.03 in early session. X
